com.cordys.coe.jni
Class PSBridge

java.lang.Object
  com.cordys.coe.jni.PSBridge

public class PSBridge
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides the JNI to interact with the windows powershell.

Constructor Detail

PSBridge

public PSBridge(java.lang.String scriptDir)
Parameters:
scriptDir - Provide the location of the directory where all your script files are located. Ex. "e:/psscripts".
This needs to be a valid location, otherwise the PSBridge would not be initialized & cannot be used.
Method Detail

execute

public java.lang.String execute(java.lang.String command,
                                java.lang.String parameters)
Parameters:
command - Pass the powershell command or script name to execute.
In case of command name, just provide the command name.
Ex. "Get-Process"

In case of script name, provide the complete path to the script file. If the script file exists in the scriptDir, provide the script file with "./" in the front.
Ex. " e:/psscripts/script.ps1" or "./Script.ps1".
parameters - Pass the parameters, as name-value pair in XML format. 
 Ex. 
 <Parameters>
   <Parameter>
     <Name>DistinguishedName</Name>
     <Value>CN=nologon,CN=Users,DC=xcorcap,DC=tst</Value>
   </Parameter>
 </Parameters>

If the parameter has no name, pass null. 
 Ex. 
 <Parameters>
   <Parameter>
     <Name>null</Name>
     <Value>e:/temp</Value>
   </Parameter>
 </Parameters>

If the command or script does not have any parameter, pass empty string "".
Returns:
Returns command or script's output.

addSnapIn

public java.lang.String addSnapIn(java.lang.String snapIn)
Parameters:
snapIn - Provide the snap in to be added to this powershell session.
Ex. "Microsoft.Exchange.Management.PowerShell.E2010"
Returns:
It returns the snapin name if sucessful, else returns the error.
